name: Dragonsguard Elite
effect:
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Dragonsguard Elite.
{4}{G}{G}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Dragonsguard Elite.

name: Asmodeus the Archfiend
effect:
Binding Contract — If you would draw a card, exile the top card of your library face down instead.
{B}{B}{B}: Draw seven cards.
{B}: Return all cards exiled with Asmodeus the Archfiend to their owner's hand and you lose that much life.

name: Black Dragon
effect:
Flying
Acid Breath — When Black Dragon enters, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

name: Cleaving Reaper
effect:
Flying, trample
Pay 3 life: Return Cleaving Reaper from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you had an Angel or Berserker enter the battlefield under your control this turn.

name: Cragplate Baloth
effect:
Kicker {2}{G}
This spell can't be countered.
Hexproof, haste
If Cragplate Baloth was kicked, it enters with four +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Dauntless Survivor
effect: When Dauntless Survivor enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Evolving Wilds
effect: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Karfell Kennel-Master
effect: When Karfell Kennel-Master enters, up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

name: Might of Murasa
effect:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.

name: Oblivion's Hunger
effect: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Draw a card if that creature has a +1/+1 counter on it. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy the creature.)

name: Oran-Rief Ooze
effect:
When Oran-Rief Ooze enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Whenever Oran-Rief Ooze attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Rabid Bite
effect: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

name: Scurrid Colony
effect:
Reach
Scurrid Colony gets +2/+2 as long as you control eight or more lands.

name: Specter of the Fens
effect:
Flying
{5}{B}: Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

name: Vampire Spawn
effect: When this creature enters, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
